projects.name: bragdoc.ai
projects.description: Saas app that lets users track their work achievements and generate documents for their boss

achievements.title: Switched to Vercel's Biome Setup for Bragdoc.ai
achievements.summary: Transitioned the Bragdoc.ai project to Vercel's Biome setup, enhancing deployment efficiency.
achievements.details: The project involved moving the Bragdoc.ai application to Vercel's Biome setup, which streamlined the deployment process and improved overall efficiency. This change was part of ongoing efforts to optimize the project's infrastructure.

achievements.title: Improved Component Performance by Memoization
achievements.summary: Enhanced component performance by implementing memoization, leading to more efficient rendering.
achievements.details: Implemented memoization for components to improve performance, resulting in more efficient rendering processes.

achievements.title: Enabled Message Editing and Resubmission
achievements.summary: Added functionality to edit and resubmit messages, enhancing user interaction capabilities.
achievements.details: Developed a feature allowing users to edit and resubmit messages, improving the flexibility and usability of the messaging system.

achievements.title: Introduced Chat Sharing Feature
achievements.summary: Implemented a feature to share chats, facilitating better communication and collaboration.
achievements.details: Added the ability to share chats, which enhances communication and collaboration among users by allowing them to easily share conversation threads.

achievements.title: Memoized Components for Performance Optimization
achievements.summary: Implemented memoization for components to enhance performance.
achievements.details: On December 10, 2024, a chore was completed to memoize components, which is a technique used to optimize performance by caching the results of expensive function calls and returning the cached result when the same inputs occur again.

achievements.title: Enhanced Datetime Validation and Documentation Update
achievements.summary: Fixed datetime validation and updated documentation for evaluation setup.
achievements.details: On December 14, 2024, enhancements were made to the eval.ts file to properly handle datetime and duration validation. Additionally, a completed evaluations section was added to PLAN.md with initial results, and the BrainTrust evaluation setup documentation was updated.

achievements.title: Implemented Google and GitHub Authentication for bragdoc.ai
achievements.summary: Started implementing Google and GitHub authentication for bragdoc.ai to enhance user login options.
achievements.details: Began the implementation of Google and GitHub authentication methods for the bragdoc.ai project, aiming to provide users with more flexible and secure login options. This step is crucial for improving user experience and security.

achievements.title: Enabled Google Login for Bragdoc.ai
achievements.summary: Implemented Google login functionality for Bragdoc.ai, enhancing user authentication options.
achievements.details: Implemented Google login functionality for Bragdoc.ai, allowing users to authenticate using their Google accounts. This enhancement improves user convenience and security by providing an additional authentication method.

achievements.title: Fixed Build Issues in Bragdoc.ai
achievements.summary: Resolved build issues in Bragdoc.ai, ensuring stable deployment and functionality.
achievements.details: Addressed and fixed multiple build issues in Bragdoc.ai, which were causing deployment failures. These fixes ensured that the application could be deployed and run smoothly, maintaining its functionality and reliability.

achievements.title: Corrected API URLs for Bragdoc.ai
achievements.summary: Fixed incorrect API URLs in Bragdoc.ai, improving data communication and integration.
achievements.details: Corrected the API URLs in Bragdoc.ai, which were previously incorrect and causing issues with data communication and integration. This fix improved the application's ability to interact with external services and ensured accurate data exchange.

achievements.title: Integrated GitHub Repository with Bragdoc.ai
achievements.summary: Initiated and progressed GitHub repository integration with Bragdoc.ai, enhancing version control and collaboration.
achievements.details: Started and made significant progress in integrating GitHub repository with Bragdoc.ai. This integration facilitates better version control and collaboration among developers, streamlining the development process.

achievements.title: Enabled Initial GitHub Syncing for Bragdoc.ai
achievements.summary: Implemented initial GitHub syncing functionality for Bragdoc.ai, facilitating seamless integration with GitHub repositories.
achievements.details: Implemented the initial functionality for syncing GitHub repositories with Bragdoc.ai, allowing users to integrate their GitHub projects seamlessly. This feature lays the groundwork for future enhancements in project tracking and management within the application.

achievements.title: Implemented Basic Brag Extraction in Chatbot for Bragdoc.ai
achievements.summary: Developed basic brag extraction functionality in the chatbot for Bragdoc.ai, enhancing user interaction and data collection.
achievements.details: Implemented a basic version of brag extraction within the chatbot feature of Bragdoc.ai. This development allows users to interact with the chatbot to extract and document their achievements, improving the user experience and data collection process.

achievements.title: Launched Initial Report Generation for Bragdoc.ai
achievements.summary: Launched the initial report generation feature for Bragdoc.ai, enabling users to create structured reports of their achievements.
achievements.details: Developed and launched the initial version of the report generation feature in Bragdoc.ai. This feature allows users to compile their documented achievements into structured reports, facilitating better presentation and review of their work.

achievements.title: Developed Streaming Brags Feature for Bragdoc.ai
achievements.summary: Implemented streaming brags feature in Bragdoc.ai, improving real-time data processing and user experience.
achievements.details: Developed the streaming brags feature for Bragdoc.ai, which includes real-time brag data processing and various UX improvements. This feature enhances the application's ability to handle live data and provides a smoother user experience.

achievements.title: Implemented Company CRUD Feature for Bragdoc.ai
achievements.summary: Developed and polished the Company CRUD feature for Bragdoc.ai, enhancing data management capabilities.
achievements.details: Implemented and refined the Company CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) feature in Bragdoc.ai. This development allows users to manage company-related data more effectively, improving the overall data management capabilities of the application.

achievements.title: Implemented Project Management System with Enhanced UI/UX
achievements.summary: Developed a comprehensive project management system with improved UI/UX, including error handling and filtering features.
achievements.details: Implemented a project management system with core UI components, enhanced layout, and interactions. Added robust error handling, filtering system, and celebratory confetti animation on project creation. Improved user experience and resolved issues with companies dropdown integration.

achievements.title: Completed Achievement Management Feature with CRUD Operations
achievements.summary: Developed the Achievement Management feature with complete CRUD functionality, UI components, and API integration.
achievements.details: Implemented the Achievement Management UI and API, including CRUD operations, database queries, and schema updates. Added features like achievement list view, creation/edit modal, and confirmation dialog for deletions. Ensured consistent UI patterns, dark mode support, and better error handling.

achievements.title: Renamed Brag Model to Achievement
achievements.summary: Renamed the Brag model to Achievement in the codebase.
achievements.details: Renamed the Brag model to Achievement to better reflect its purpose and functionality within the application.

achievements.title: Developed Achievements API Tests
achievements.summary: Implemented tests for the Achievements API to ensure reliability and correctness.
achievements.details: Developed and implemented a suite of tests for the Achievements API, enhancing the reliability and correctness of the API's functionality.

achievements.title: Implemented Achievement Impact Rating System
achievements.summary: Added a comprehensive impact rating system for achievements, allowing user and LLM-assigned ratings.
achievements.details: Implemented a comprehensive impact rating system for achievements, including a 3-star UI, tracking of impact source, and last update time. This feature allows users to rate achievements from low to high impact and provides clear visual feedback about impact levels.

achievements.title: Added Welcome Carousel to Application
achievements.summary: Introduced a welcome carousel to enhance user onboarding experience.
achievements.details: Added a welcome carousel to the application to improve the user onboarding experience, making it more engaging and informative for new users.

achievements.title: Integrated Stripe for Payment Processing
achievements.summary: Integrated Stripe for payment processing, though webhook functionality is pending.
achievements.details: Integrated Stripe into the application for handling payment processing. However, the webhook functionality is not yet operational.

achievements.title: Developed Marketing Landing Pages for Bragdoc.ai
achievements.summary: Created 'What', 'Why', and 'How' marketing landing pages for Bragdoc.ai to enhance user engagement.
achievements.details: Added comprehensive marketing landing pages including 'What', 'Why', and 'How' sections to improve user understanding and engagement with Bragdoc.ai.

achievements.title: Enhanced Document Management Features for Bragdoc.ai
achievements.summary: Improved document management with CRUD operations and API tests for Bragdoc.ai.
achievements.details: Worked on enhancing the document management system by implementing CRUD operations and conducting API tests to ensure functionality and reliability in Bragdoc.ai.

achievements.title: Improved Mobile UX for Bragdoc.ai
achievements.summary: Implemented mobile UX improvements for Bragdoc.ai to enhance user experience on mobile devices.
achievements.details: Focused on improving the mobile user experience by making UX enhancements, ensuring better accessibility and interaction for Bragdoc.ai users on mobile devices.

achievements.title: Optimized Plan Picker UX for Mobile Devices
achievements.summary: Enhanced the plan picker UX for mobile devices in Bragdoc.ai, improving user interaction and satisfaction.
achievements.details: Addressed mobile UX issues by optimizing the plan picker interface, ensuring a smoother and more intuitive user experience for Bragdoc.ai users on mobile platforms.

achievements.title: Released CLI and Blog Features for Bragdoc.ai
achievements.summary: Launched CLI and blog features for Bragdoc.ai, expanding functionality and user engagement.
achievements.details: Developed and released new CLI and blog features, enhancing the functionality and providing users with more tools and resources within Bragdoc.ai.

achievements.title: Enhanced Document Generation with Weekly Evals
achievements.summary: Improved document generation by integrating weekly evaluations and chatbot connectivity.
achievements.details: Implemented a better document generation system by setting up a weekly document writing evaluation and connecting the document generator to a chatbot. This enhancement ensures more accurate and efficient document creation.

achievements.title: Structured Braintrust Evals and Added LLM-Comparison
achievements.summary: Reorganized Braintrust evaluations and introduced a new LLM-comparison evaluation.
achievements.details: Reorganized the structure of Braintrust evaluations to improve clarity and added the first LLM-comparison evaluation. This restructuring helps in better assessment and comparison of language models.

achievements.title: Migrated Prompts to JSX and Unified Prompting Pattern
achievements.summary: Migrated all prompts to JSX and unified the prompting pattern for consistency.
achievements.details: Migrated all existing prompts to a jsx-prompt format and cleaned up the old prompting methods into a unified fetch/render/execute pattern. This migration and unification enhance the consistency and maintainability of the system.

achievements.title: Enhanced Standup Page to Display Recent Achievements
achievements.summary: Updated the Standup page to show only recent achievements, improving user focus.
achievements.details: The commit 'Show only recent Achievements on Standup page' updated the Standup page of the Bragdoc AI project to display only recent achievements. This change helps users focus on the most relevant and recent information during standups.

achievements.title: Implemented Standup Document Back-Generation and Enhanced Achievement Views
achievements.summary: Added functionality to generate historical standup documents and enhanced achievement views for better context.
achievements.details: Implemented the ability to generate historical standup documents for the last 7 days, allowing users to view standup summaries as if they had been using the feature all along. Enhanced the standup page with dual achievement views for better context. Key changes include refactoring the achievements-summary route to use shared document creation logic, adding a 'range' query parameter to the achievements endpoint, updating the RecentUpdatesTable with a 'Generate Standups for last 7 days' button, and adding a second achievements table showing a 7-day history. The standup page now displays achievements since the last standup, achievements from the last 7 days, and historical standup documents or a generation button.

achievements.title: Implemented Standup Fixes and Code Linting
achievements.summary: Addressed standup issues and improved code quality through linting.
achievements.details: The commits involved making necessary fixes and tweaks identified during standup meetings, as well as performing code linting to ensure code quality and consistency. These changes contribute to smoother project operations and maintainability.

achievements.title: Implemented Project Management System with Enhanced UI/UX

achievements.title: Developed Achievement Management UI and API with CRUD Functionality

It also featured a confirmation dialog for deletions, loading states, and toast notifications. The API layer was developed with CRUD operations, database queries, schema updates, and achievement mutations hook for data management. Consistent UI patterns were maintained across the app, with dark mode support and improved error handling.

achievements.title: Enhanced RecentAchievementsTable to Filter Current Standup Achievements
achievements.summary: Improved the RecentAchievementsTable component to filter out current-period achievements from the orphaned list, ensuring accurate standup document generation.
achievements.details: Completed enhancement to the RecentAchievementsTable component to properly handle achievements belonging to the current standup period. This addresses the temporal boundary between historical and current achievements. The component now calculates the current standup period's start date using getStandupAchievementDateRange() based on the standup's schedule configuration (timezone, meeting time, days mask). Achievements with eventStart or createdAt dates on or after this timestamp are filtered out from the orphaned achievements list, preventing them from appearing prematurely before the current standup document is generated. Additionally restructured the UI render order to be more logical: standup documents appear first, followed by the 'Generate Missing Standup Documents' button (when needed), and finally the filtered orphaned achievements section. Updated the button visibility logic to check filteredOrphanedAchievements instead of the raw orphaned list, ensuring accurate detection of missing standup documents. This change prepares for the future 'Today's Standup' component (tracked separately) which will display achievements from the current period that haven't been included in a standup document yet.

achievements.summary: Developed a comprehensive reports feature in BragDoc AI, enabling users to generate AI-powered documents from tracked achievements.
achievements.details: The feature allows users to create weekly, monthly, and custom reports by selecting achievements and customizing generation prompts. It integrates with the main application's database, API, and AI infrastructure. Key components include a reports listing page, dynamic routes for new report creation, and a document generation API endpoint. Enhancements include improved sidebar navigation and smart user preference saving. Two critical bugs were fixed, and comprehensive documentation was added.

achievements.title: Removed Deprecated Chat UI Components
achievements.summary: Eliminated outdated chat UI elements to streamline the codebase.
achievements.details: The commit involved deleting old chat UI components that were no longer in use, helping to clean up the codebase and reduce potential maintenance overhead.

achievements.title: Updated to AI SDK v5 for Enhanced Capabilities
achievements.summary: Upgraded the project to AI SDK version 5, enhancing AI capabilities and performance.
achievements.details: The project was updated to use AI SDK version 5, which provides improved AI capabilities and performance enhancements. This update ensures compatibility with the latest features and optimizations offered by the SDK.

achievements.title: Removed Obsolete Tables and Queries from Database
achievements.summary: Eliminated vestigial vote and suggestion tables and queries to streamline database operations.
achievements.details: The commit involved removing outdated vote and suggestion tables along with their associated queries from the database. This cleanup helps in reducing unnecessary complexity and potential maintenance overhead in the bragdoc-ai project.

achievements.title: Integrated Canvas Editing UX from Vercel Chatbot
achievements.summary: Migrated the canvas/document editing user experience from Vercel chatbot to Bragdoc.ai.
achievements.details: The commit involved bringing over the majority of the canvas and document editing user experience from the Vercel chatbot to the Bragdoc.ai project. This likely involved adapting existing code and interfaces to fit the new application context, enhancing the user interaction capabilities of Bragdoc.ai.

achievements.title: Implemented CI Evaluation for Bragdoc AI
achievements.summary: Set up continuous integration evaluation to ensure code quality and reliability.
achievements.details: The commit 'evals CI' indicates the implementation of a continuous integration (CI) evaluation process for the Bragdoc AI project. This setup is crucial for maintaining code quality and reliability by automatically running tests and checks on new code changes.

achievements.title: Migrated LLM Achievement Extraction from API to CLI
achievements.summary: Implemented a major architectural change moving achievement extraction logic from the Bragdoc web API to the CLI tool.
achievements.details: This commit implements a major architectural change that moves achievement extraction logic from the Bragdoc web API to the CLI tool, enabling local processing of Git commits using the user's own OpenAI API key. The CLI now requires the `OPENAI_API_KEY` environment variable, and repositories must have a projectId (run `bragdoc init` to set up).

achievements.title: Refactored Standup Page for Better User Experience
achievements.summary: Improved the standup page with enhanced achievement views and historical document generation.
achievements.details: This change includes multiple commits from 2025-10-09 to 2025-10-10. Commits include updating impact score, removing unnecessary code, enhancing the standup page with dual achievement views, adding back-generation of standup documents for the last 7 days, and fixing bugs related to editing Standup Dialog. The changes aim at improving user experience by providing a better overview of achievements and standup history.

achievements.title: Optimized Codebase by Removing Redundant Functions
achievements.summary: Removed unnecessary wrapper function and vestigial sidebar file to improve codebase efficiency.
achievements.details: Commits from 2025-10-09 show the removal of a pointless wrapper function and a vestigial sidebar file. These changes contribute to maintaining a clean and efficient codebase by eliminating redundant elements.

achievements.title: Enhanced Achievement Views with Historical Standup Documents
achievements.summary: Added functionality to generate historical standup documents for better context and enhanced achievement views.
achievements.details: This includes the addition of a reusable document creation function, calculation of standup occurrences in a range, and an endpoint for back-generating standup documents. These enhancements improve how achievements are viewed and understood by adding historical context through generated standup documents.

achievements.title: Improved Header Design for Standup Page
achievements.summary: Refined the header design on the Standup page for better user experience.
achievements.details: The commit 'Better header for Standup page' involved refining the header design on the Standup page of the Bragdoc AI project. This improvement enhances the user experience by providing a clearer and more aesthetically pleasing interface.

achievements.title: Implemented Standups Feature with Alpha Version
Developed New Achievements Page with Integrated Table
achievements.summary: Created a new Achievements page and integrated an achievements table into the UI.
achievements.details: The development of a new Achievements page began with the commit 'WIP on new UI', followed by 'new Achievements page' which introduced the page. The commit 'achievements table integrated' completed the integration of the achievements table into the UI, enhancing the user interface and experience.

achievements.title: Implemented Real Data Loading on Achievements Page
achievements.summary: Loaded real data on the Achievements page to enhance data accuracy and user experience.
achievements.details: Commit cde16cc79d1a5246b939d221c1b0385e2f2667c7 involved loading real data on the Achievements page, replacing any placeholder or mock data to ensure users see accurate and up-to-date information.

achievements.title: Enhanced Dashboard with Better Data Integration
achievements.summary: Improved data integration on the dashboard for more reliable and comprehensive statistics.
achievements.details: Commits 86c70ae6597f72aca1c1d5c6e373db2fe59e4e2e and d0819b240c0df289ccc15e48fdd4d579617e6fd9 focused on enhancing data integration on the dashboard, ensuring that statistics are accurately reflected and updated in real-time.

achievements.title: Implemented Standups Feature in UI and CLI
achievements.summary: Added first alpha version of new Standups feature, both in UI and CLI, with project-based terminology and achievement extraction.
achievements.details: Added first alpha version of new Standups feature, both in UI and CLI. Added `data` CLI command and backing library functions. Updated CLI to deal with Projects rather than Repos, have multiple Standups. Basic bragdoc wip command. Renamed repos to projects in CLI. Refactored cache commands to change '--repo' option to '--project' for better alignment with project-based terminology. Implemented extracting achievements from enrolled projects in the 'standup' command, utilizing a new function 'extractAchievementsFromProject'. Achievements are processed in batches, with results logged for each project. Enhanced configuration management by cleaning up orphaned standup configs, ensuring configurations align with existing enrolled projects. Updated README with Standup details.

achievements.details: Commit 01059548f7a179fbc7d3c66089f4b242a4ca7f83 introduces dark mode support, enhancing the user interface and accessibility for users who prefer or require a dark theme.

achievements.title: Developed New Achievements Page and UI Enhancements

achievements.details: Work in progress on a new UI led to the development of a dedicated Achievements page. This included integrating an achievements table, enhancing the user interface to better display user achievements within the Bragdoc.ai application.

achievements.title: Developed New Achievements Page for bragdoc-ai

achievements.details: The development of a new UI for the bragdoc-ai project included the creation of a new Achievements page. This involved integrating an achievements table, as seen in the commits 'new Achievements page' and 'achievements table integrated'. This enhancement improves user interaction by providing a dedicated space for tracking achievements.

achievements.title: Implemented Multi-Provider LLM Support with Config File Storage
achievements.summary: Replaced hardcoded OpenAI dependency with a flexible multi-provider LLM system, enhancing reliability in cron/Task Scheduler environments.
achievements.details: The commit introduced a multi-provider LLM system, replacing the hardcoded OpenAI dependency. Configuration is now stored in ~/.bragdoc/config.yml, ensuring reliable scheduled extractions. Supported providers include OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, DeepSeek, and Ollama. Key changes include new commands for LLM management, interactive setup prompts, and a provider factory pattern. The AI SDK was upgraded, and comprehensive documentation was added.

documents.title: Weekly Report
documents.content:
# Weekly Report

A little change

## Key Accomplishments

* **Integrated Canvas Editing UX from Vercel Chatbot**

  * Migrated the canvas/document editing user experience to enhance ease of use.

* **Implemented AI-Powered Reports Feature for Manager Updates**

  * Developed a comprehensive reports feature, allowing users to generate documents from tracked achievements efficiently.

* **Removed Obsolete Tables and Queries from Database**

  * Streamlined database operations by eliminating outdated tables and queries.

* **Updated to AI SDK v5 for Enhanced Capabilities**

  * Upgraded the project to the latest SDK version, improving AI performance.

## Progress on Ongoing Projects

* **Post-Build Permission Adjustment for Bragdoc AI**

  * Added a chmod operation to the build process, ensuring correct file permissions.

* **Enhanced RecentAchievementsTable**

  * Improved component to filter current-period achievements, enhancing accuracy in document generation.

## Blockers or Challenges

No significant blockers or challenges faced this week. Continued progress on development tasks without major issues.

## Plans for Next Week

* Continue refining the UX for the Bragdoc.ai platform based on recent integrations and feedback.

* Focus on further optimization of database performance and API integrations.

This report summarizes the progress and key accomplishments achieved this week, along with future plans to maintain momentum.
